ABOUT




I BRIDGE THE GAP BETWEEN CREATIVE VISIONS AND MEASURABLE RESULTS....


As a dedicated professional in project management and administrative services. I bring a wealth of experience and expertise to every endeavour. Explore my portfolio to discover how i excel in orchestrating successful projects and providing efficient administrative solutions.

I am passionate about exceeding expectations and delivering results that make a real difference. I am a team player who thrives in collaborative environments and is always willing to go the extra mile. I am also a lifelong learner, constantly seeking new ways to improve my skills and knowledge.

SERVICES





WHAT I DO AS A PROJECT MANAGER

In every project, I start by defining the project scope, objectives and stakeholders before i proceed into planning. I also develop project plans, schedules, and resource allocation.


I lead and manage the project team to achieve project goals, and also monitoring and controlling progress, managing risks, and ensuring adherence to plans.


I practice flexibility to adjust plans and strategies in response to changes in the project.


I address the issues that arise during the project and find solutions. I manage and ensure the budget to keep projects within allocated finance.


I am proficient with many tools and i use project management tools and relevant industry technologies to execute projects perfectly.


I manage tasks, resources, and information efficiently.

WHAT I DO IN ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES

Organization: I streamline administrative processes, and maintain and organize files respectively.


Scheduling & Calendar Management: Coordinate appointments, meetings, and events effectively.


Communication Handling: Manage emails, calls, and correspondence, ensuring prompt and accurate responses.


Data Entry and Record keeping: Maintain accurate records and handle data entry tasks as needed.


Travel Coordination: Arrange travel plans, accommodations, and Itineraries for team members or executive.


Document Preparation: Create and format documents, reports, and presentation as required.
